isis.stitle: 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14613 - INSTALL - SLAVE VALVE

step1.para: If previously removed, install the air line fittings on the slave valve ( Figure 288).

figure.caption: Figure 288. Install Air Line Fittings on Slave Valve

step1.para: Install the spring on the shank of the actuating pin and insert in the bore of the transmission case ( Figure 289).

figure.caption: Figure 289. Install Spring on Shank of Actuating Pin and Insert in Transmission Case Bore

step1.para: Install the hat-type alignment sleeve in the bore of the slave valve ( Figure 290).

figure.caption: Figure 290. Install Hat-Type Alignment Sleeve in Slave Valve Bore

step1.para: Position gasket on the valve mounting surface ( inset, Figure 291) and install the slave valve on the case, inserting the end of the actuating pin into the alignment sleeve ( Figure 291). Secure the valve to case with the four bolts. Apply Loctite 242 to the bolt threads and tighten evenly to 8 to 12 ft-lbs. (11 to 16 N· m).

figure.caption: Figure 291. Position Gasket on Valve Mounting Surface and Secure Valve to Case With Bolts
